messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,

I believe we need a real change and UKIP is the answer. Successive governments have neglected British people, leaving young people with tuition fees debt, uncontrolled mass immigration, an under-resourced police force, NHS at breaking point, libraries closing down, thousands depending upon food banks and elderly freezing in winter. Yet we pay £55 million per day to the EU and £12 billion a year in foreign aid. Does this make sense to you? I am asking for your vote, to represent and work for you in Luton South.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: Yet we pay £55 million per day to the EU.
issues.economy: Successive governments have neglected British people, leaving young people with tuition fees debt, uncontrolled mass immigration.

images.caption: Yasin Rehman - Standing Up for Real Change

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Robert Clements on behalf of Yasin Rehman, 21 Crawley Road, Luton, Bedfordshire, LU1 1HX. Printed by Media Print Hub, Park Lane House, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.
